meanings.definition: The result or product of work or activity.
meanings.sent1: After planting the seeds, the farmer eagerly awaited the fruitages of his labor.
meanings.sent2: The fruitages of her painting were admired by all who saw them.
meanings.sent3: The fruitages of the baking contest left everyone craving more sweets.
meanings.sent4: The fruitages of their teamwork were evident in the successful completion of the project.
meanings.sent5: The delicious fruitages of the chef's culinary skills left the guests in awe.

meanings.definition: The yield or profit produced by labor or investment.
meanings.sent1: The business owner was pleased with the financial fruitages of his latest investment.
meanings.sent2: Investing in stocks can sometimes yield unexpected fruitages.
meanings.sent3: The fruitages of the lemonade stand were enough to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The fruitages of her savings allowed her to take a well-deserved vacation.
meanings.sent5: The fruitages of his hard work were evident in the growing bank account.
